'''ilpen''' in [[Telerin]] means "everybody".<ref>{{HM|WJ}} p.375</ref> 
==Etymology==
This word is one of the few old compounds<ref>{{HM|WJ}} p.362</ref>

It includes the element ''[[pen]]'' "person". The prefix ''[[il-]]''
